ul.li: Create a Quotation with "Ray-ban RB0707S", then confirm the order.
Go to Inventory > Delivery Orders

template.p: Odoo automates the propositions of products to replenish. To check the list, go to Inventory > Operations > Replenishment and perform the following operations.

ul.li: "Ray-ban RB0707S" will be replenished from vendor.
"Dolce & Gabbana DG2256" is not available in New York Warehouse. So, Odoo proposes to replenish from Texas Warehouse where stock is available.
Create Purchase quotation from Inventory > Operations > Replenishment
Confirm a Purchase quotation from Purchase > Request for quotation.
Go to Inventory > Operation > Receipts.
Validate the Receipt.
Create the Replenishment Orders from Texas Warehouse to New York Warehouse.
From Inventory > Operation > Deliveries, validate delivery from Texas Warehouse.
From Inventory > Operation > Receipts validate receipts in New York Warehouse.

template.h2: Flow 3: Appointment Booking for Eye Tests

ul.li: Go to "Eye Test Appointments (New York)"
Fill up the Appointment Slot, contact details & confirm an appointment.

template.p: To manage appointments, the showroom manager uses the CRM app where all the information about the customer requests are available:

ul.li: Navigate to CRM > Opportunities
Choose the opportunity that arises once an appointment has been confirmed.
Mention details such as Lens or Glass prescription.
Open the customer form in order print prescription details.
Add product "ACUVUE - Oasys with Hydraclear Plus" to cart
Proceed to checkout
As lenses need prescriptions, the user will have to fill information during checkout process.
Select products and proceed to checkout.

template.blockquote: Use discount code "FreedomFest" before checkout to get a discount on your order

ul.li: Select the customer
Add the products to the cart
Select any of the payment method and proceed for the payment.
